    • Constructor Detail

      • Ellipse

        public Ellipse(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double centerPoint,
               double majorRadius,
               double minorRadius)
        Creates a horizontal ellipse based on a center point, and 2 radius'
        Parameters:
        centerPoint - Point2D.Double (x,y) coordinates for the center of the ellipse
        minorRadius - the smaller (vertical) radius as a double
        majorRadius - the larger (horizontal) radius as a double
